data.englishTranslation: In the Name of Allah, I have placed my trust in Allah, there is no might and no power except by Allah.
data.transliteration: Bismillaahi, tawakkaltu 'alallaahi, wa laa hawla wa laa quwwata ‘illaa billaah.
data.arabicVerse: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْـتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُـوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّهِ

data.englishTranslation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I misguide others, or I am misguided by others, lest I cause others to err or I am caused to err, lest I abuse others or be abused, and lest I behave foolishly or meet with the foolishness of others.
data.arabicVerse: اَللَّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعُـوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِـلَّ أَوْ أُضَـلَّ، أَوْ أَزِلَّ أَوْ أُزَلَّ، أَوْ أَظْلِـمَ أَوْ أَُظْلَـمَ، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ أَوْ يُـجْهَلَ عَلَـيَّ
data.reference: [Hisnul 17] [Abu Dawud, Ibn Majah, An-Nasa'i, At-Tirmizi, Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmizi 3/152, Sahih Ibn Majah 2/336]
